titleInfo.title: Biblia Sacra iuxta vulgatam quam dicvnt Editionem, A Mendis Qvibvs Innumeris ... scatebat ... repurgata, atq[ue] ad priscorũ probatissimorúmque exemplariorum normam ... Ioannis Benedicti ... industria restituta ... Adiecta est ... Hebraicarum, Græcarum, cæterarúmque peregrinarum uocum ... interpretatio ...

originInfo.publisher: Prostant apud Carolam Guillard, & Gulielmum Desboys

mods.note: Bound in contemporary brown morocco, with gold tooling in the Grolieresque style; with edges gauffered and gilt.
First published, Paris, S. de Colines, 1541.--cf. British and foreign Bible soc. Historical cat., note after 6119.

location.shelfLocator: *KB+++ 1549 (Bible. Biblia Sacra iuxta vulgatam quam dicvnt Editionem)
